sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, CardHeader, CardTitle } from './ui/Card'; import { Button } from './ui/Button'; import { CheckCircle, Clock, Lock, Play, ArrowLeft, BookOpen, FileText, Trophy, Target, BarChart3 } from 'lucide-react'; const CourseQuizListPage = ({ courseId, onBack, onStartQuiz }) => { // 模拟课程信息 const courseInfo = { id: courseId, title: '员工手册学习', description: '全面了解公司规章制度、企业文化和工作流程', instructor: '人事部', totalQuizzes: 5, completedQuizzes: 2, progress: 40 }; // 模拟小测数据 const quizzesData = [ { id: 1, title: '公司概况与企业文化', description: '了解公司历史、愿景使命和核心价值观', status: 'completed', score: 85, maxScore: 100, duration: 15, questionCount: 10, attempts: 1, maxAttempts: 3, completedAt: '2024-01-10 14:30', order: 1 }, { id: 2, title: '组织架构与部门职能', description: '掌握公司组织结构和各部门主要职责', status: 'completed', score: 92, maxScore: 100, duration: 20, questionCount: 15, attempts: 1, maxAttempts: 3, completedAt: '2024-01-12 10:15', order: 2 }, { id: 3, title: '员工行为准则', description: '学习员工应遵守的行为规范和职业道德', status: 'available', score: null, maxScore: 100, duration: 25, questionCount: 20, attempts: 0, maxAttempts: 3, completedAt: null, order: 3 }, { id: 4, title: '薪酬福利制度', description: '了解公司薪酬体系和员工福利政策', status: 'locked', score: null, maxScore: 100, duration: 18, questionCount: 12, attempts: 0, maxAttempts: 3, completedAt: null, order: 4 }, { id: 5, title: '考勤与请假制度', description: '掌握考勤管理和请假流程相关规定', status: 'locked', score: null, maxScore: 100, duration: 22, questionCount: 18, attempts: 0, maxAttempts: 3, completedAt: null, order: 5 } ]; const getStatusIcon = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'completed': return ; case 'available': return ; case 'locked': return ; default: return ; } }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'completed': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800 border-green-200'; case 'available': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border-blue-200'; case 'locked': return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-500 border-gray-200'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-500 border-gray-200'; } }; const getStatusText = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'completed': return '已完成'; case 'available': return '可开始'; case 'locked': return '未解锁'; default: return '未知'; } }; const handleStartQuiz = (quizId) => { if (onStartQuiz) { onStartQuiz(quizId); } }; const getScoreColor = (score) => { if (score >= 90) return 'text-green-600'; if (score >= 80) return 'text-blue-600'; if (score >= 70) return 'text-yellow-600'; return 'text-red-600'; }; return (
{/* 返回按钮和课程标题 */}

{courseInfo.title}

{courseInfo.description}

讲师: {courseInfo.instructor} 小测数量: {courseInfo.totalQuizzes} 已完成: {courseInfo.completedQuizzes}
{/* 课程进度 */}
课程进度 {courseInfo.progress}%
{/* 统计信息 */}

总小测

{courseInfo.totalQuizzes}

已完成

{courseInfo.completedQuizzes}

剩余

{courseInfo.totalQuizzes - courseInfo.completedQuizzes}

平均分

{courseInfo.completedQuizzes > 0 ? Math.round(quizzesData.filter(q => q.status === 'completed').reduce((sum, q) => sum + q.score, 0) / courseInfo.completedQuizzes) : 0 }

{/* 小测列表 */}

小测列表

{quizzesData.map((quiz, index) => (
{/* 序号和状态图标 */}
{quiz.order}
{getStatusIcon(quiz.status)}
{/* 小测信息 */}

{quiz.title}

{getStatusText(quiz.status)}

{quiz.description}

{quiz.duration} 分钟
{quiz.questionCount} 题
{quiz.attempts}/{quiz.maxAttempts} 次尝试
{quiz.status === 'completed' && (
{quiz.score}/{quiz.maxScore} 分
)}
{quiz.status === 'completed' && quiz.completedAt && (
完成时间: {quiz.completedAt}
)}
{/* 操作按钮 */}
{quiz.status === 'available' && ( )} {quiz.status === 'completed' && (
{quiz.attempts >= quiz.maxAttempts && ( 已达最大尝试次数 )}
)} {quiz.status === 'locked' && (
需完成前置小测
)}
))}
{/* 提示信息 */}

小测说明：

  • • 需要按顺序完成小测，完成前一个才能解锁下一个
  • • 每个小测最多可尝试 3 次
  • • 完成所有小测后，课程进度将更新为 100%
  • • 建议得分达到 80 分以上再进行下一个小测
); }; export default CourseQuizListPage;
